Hero.title:
Experience Serenity &
Savor Delights
Hero.subtitle: A unique destination blending the comfort of a luxury guesthouse with the vibrant flavors of a public social space.

Home.welcomeText: Nestled in the heart of nature, AQEYO offers a unique fusion of peaceful accommodation and culinary excellence. Whether you're seeking a restful escape in our cozy guesthouse or looking to indulge your taste buds at our lively social space, we promise an unforgettable experience enriched with local charm and warmth.
Home.offeringsSubtitle: From comfortable stays to artisan coffee, explore what makes us special.
Home.guesthouseText: Relax in our beautifully designed rooms, featuring modern amenities, serene garden views, and the ultimate comfort for a perfect night's sleep.
Home.socialSpaceText: Savor locally sourced coffee, delicious meals, and mouth-watering desserts in a vibrant, open-air setting perfect for socializing or unwinding.
Home.ctaText: Book your stay today and experience the magic of AQEYO.

Footer.description: Experience the perfect blend of serenity and flavor. A unique guesthouse and social space destination designed for your comfort and delight.
